scripts.android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && react-native run-android
scripts.cache-reset: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn install && yarn start -- --reset-cache
